name: Lights Off (itch) (alliteration games)
description:
Updates are gonna follow the next one, two weeks.

Looking forward to any feedback!

___________________________________________________________________________

Tried to use an asset pack and had lighting issues with it. Wanted to fix them but didn't realize the jam finished at noon. Hence the very short default mat level. Hope you enjoy, stay tuned!

also, mouse sens settings are definitely on the to do list ^^
